name: spiccato
description: A general purpose state management library that provides high level automation and of common state management tasks and is easily extendible and customizable.

scripts.build: npx tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && npx tsc -p tsconfig.browser.json && cp package.json ./dist/node && cp package.json ./dist/browser && cp src/cli.js dist/browser && cp src/cli.js dist/node
